explains: v. 爱抚，亲吻；轻触，轻拍

sentences.en: He went up to Pinocchio and began to pet and caress him.
sentences.cn: 他走到皮诺乔跟前，开始抚摸、爱抚他。

sentences.en: Margaret took me to one side, holding my arm in a gentle caress.
sentences.cn: 玛格丽特把我拉到一旁，轻轻地抚弄着我的手臂。

sentences.en: She holds up her hands, letting the TENDRILS caress her.
sentences.cn: 她抬起她的双手，让卷须轻拂着她。
